Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: GetDate()

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
SET NOCOUNT OFF
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT AppID FROM Applications WHERE AppName = @AppName) BEGIN INSERT INTO Applications (AppName, AppVersion, AppDesc) VALUES(@AppName, @AppVersion, @AppDesc); RETURN 1 END ELSE RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[AddNewBug] @UserID int ,@AppID int ,@BugDate DATETIME ,@BugDesc varchar(40) ,@BugDetails text ,@RepSteps text AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
SET NOCOUNT OFF
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT UserID FROM Users WHERE UserEmail = @UserEmail) BEGIN INSERT INTO Users (UserName, UserEmail, UserTel) VALUES(@UserName, @UserEmail, @UserTel); RETURN 1 END ELSE RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[AddNewUser] @UserName varchar(80) ,@UserEmail varchar(80) ,@UserTel varchar(40) AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SET NOCOUNT ON /*Stops the message that shows the count of the number of rows affected by the statement*/ BEGIN IF EXISTS (SELECT UserID FROM Users WHERE UserName = @UserName) set @Result = 1 ELSE set @Result = 0 END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
SET NOCOUNT ON
IF Not Exists (SELECT BugID FROM Bugs WHERE AppID = (SELECT AppID FROM Applications WHERE AppName = @AppName)) BEGIN DELETE FROM Applications WHERE AppName = @AppName; select @Status = 1 if(@@ROWCOUNT = 0) BEGIN RAISERROR('Application deletion failed', 16, 1) END END ELSE select @Status = 0
